title: Ajmal Waste and Damage Solutions
description: A cross-platform mobile app built with React Native and Expo for reporting and managing waste and damage issues, featuring a clean interface, multi-language support, and easy access to scheduling, complaints, technical support, and emergencies.

title: Pan De-Habibi POS
description: A mobile-first Point of Sale system for a bakery, built with Vue 3 and TypeScript. Features offline-first architecture using IndexedDB, allowing cashiers to process sales without internet connectivity.

title: Barangay Issue System
description: Community issue tracking system built with Laravel and Vue 3 that enables residents to report local problems and barangay officials to manage resolutions. Includes admin analytics dashboard, photo documentation, and a public transparency page showing resolved issues.

title: Genshin Archives
description: A Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS app featuring an interactive database of Genshin Impact characters, regions, artifacts, and weapons, with search and filter options by element, weapon type, and rarity.
